charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] ran into
Carmine, who was chatting with Penny.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_0200_:
Oh? Come to say hi all on your own, eh?
Good, good!
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_0300_:
Carmine and I were just chatting about
Pecharunt.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_0400_: It serves others its poisonous Binding Mochi...
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_0500_:
and turns the people and Pokémon who eat
it into its underlings! What a real annoying
super jerk!
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_0600_:
But now that we’re a sync pair, I’ve been
learning more about my partner.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_0700_:
Penny’s been helping me, since she’s so
good at digging up intel.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_0800_:
Just now, I was telling her some stuff I
learned about the legends surrounding
Pecharunt.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_0900_:
You seem pretty interested yourself,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], so listen up!
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_1000_: Ah, you got dragged into a lecture...
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_1100_: It’s a long story, so I’ll just summarize.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_1200_:
According to one theory, Pecharunt once
lived with an old married couple.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_1300_:
And Pecharunt serves mochi that draws out
the desires and capabilities of those who eat
it. So...
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_1400_:
The old couple got greedy and wanted
masks from the Land of Kitakami.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_1500_:
Pecharunt, hoping for more praise, rounded
up some underlings and headed to the
Land of Kitakami.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_1600_:
But when it tried to take the masks,
the owner got upset and gave Pecharunt
a walloping.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_1700_:
So Pecharunt retreated into its shell and
entered a deep slumber. And that’s the story!
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_1800_: Makes me feel kinda bad for it...
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_0301_1900_:
Maybe it just wanted to make the
old couple happy.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_0401_2000_: Hmm... So that’s what you two think, huh.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_0302_2100_: Maybe it didn’t mean any harm.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_2300_:
Listen, when it comes to Pecharunt, you have
to be careful what you believe.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_2400_:
Back in the Land of Kitakami, Pecharunt’s
underlings—who were the WORST—went
down in history as heroes.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_2500_:
There’s no way to know how true the
legend is!
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_2700_: I suppose it’s not fair to assume the worst.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_2800_:
So I’ll keep a close watch—and figure out
whether the legends are true!
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_2900_:
Now that we’re partners, I won’t let you get
away with being a menace.
charaepi_ch0356_10_zeiyu/2301_1201_3000_:
But if you’re good, I’ll take care of you as
MY underling!
